description.value: Character can hover for 1d10+2xToughness Bonus Minutes. While their Maglev Coils are active, they can move at Run Speed as a Half Action and suffer no damage from falling. Each use drains half the power stored in the coils (typically meaning they can be used twice before requiring recharge).
